QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, odf_ca_clr_init_contacts.id odf_pk, odf_ca_clr_init_contacts.how_contacted as how_contacted, odf_ca_clr_init_contacts.code as code, odf_ca_clr_init_contacts.comments as comments, odf_ca_clr_init_contacts.vsm_comments as vsm_comments, odf_ca_clr_init_contacts.vsm_contact as vsm_contact, odf_parent_id.odf_period_end as odf_period_end, odf_parent_id.odf_period_type as odf_period_type, odf_ca_clr_init_contacts.vsm_date_contacted as vsm_date_contacted, (select audit_tmplt_created.full_name from (select full_name, user_id from srm_resources) audit_tmplt_created where audit_tmplt_created.user_id = odf_ca_clr_init_contacts.created_by) as created_by, odf_parent_id.odf_period_start as odf_period_start, odf_ca_clr_init_contacts.clr_date_contact as clr_date_contact, odf_ca_clr_init_contacts.contact as contact, (select audit_tmplt_updated.full_name from (select full_name, user_id from srm_resources) audit_tmplt_updated where audit_tmplt_updated.user_id = odf_ca_clr_init_contacts.last_updated_by) as updated_by, odf_ca_clr_init_contacts.name as name, odf_ca_clr_init_contacts.odf_parent_id as odf_parent_id, odf_ca_clr_init_contacts.created_date as created_date, odf_ca_clr_init_contacts.partition_code as partition_code, odf_ca_clr_init_contacts.last_updated_date as last_updated_date, odf_ca_clr_init_contacts.vsm_how_contacted as vsm_how_contacted, odf_ca_clr_init_contacts.odf_cncrt_parent_id as odf_cncrt_parent_id, odf_parent_id.odf_entity_code as odf_entity_code from odf_ca_clr_init_contacts odf_ca_clr_init_contacts, (select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, inv_investments.id odf_pk, odf_ca_inv.odf_period_type as odf_period_type, odf_ca_inv.odf_period_start as odf_period_start, odf_ca_npiofinproperties.odf_entity_code as odf_entity_code, odf_ca_inv.odf_period_end as odf_period_end from inv_investments inv_investments, odf_ca_inv odf_ca_inv, odf_ca_npiofinproperties odf_ca_npiofinproperties, pac_mnt_projects PAC_MNT_PROJECTS, fin_financials fin_financials, odf_object_instance_mapping oim4, odf_ca_financials odf_ca_financials where 1 = 1 and inv_investments.id = odf_ca_inv.id and inv_investments.id = odf_ca_npiofinproperties.id and inv_investments.id = PAC_MNT_PROJECTS.id and inv_investments.id = oim4.primary_object_instance_id and oim4.primary_object_instance_code = 'clr_epic' and fin_financials.id = oim4.secondary_object_instance_id and oim4.secondary_object_instance_code = 'financials' and FIN_FINANCIALS.id = odf_ca_financials.id) odf_parent_id where 1 = 1 and odf_ca_clr_init_contacts.odf_parent_id = odf_parent_id.odf_pk
